documentation.content: Customers are segmented by YearlyIncome in DimCustomer. High-value customers have YearlyIncome > 100000. The Gender field uses 'M' for Male and 'F' for Female.
Total revenue is calculated as SUM(SalesAmount) from FactInternetSales. Net revenue excludes TaxAmt and Freight: SalesAmount - TaxAmt - Freight.
The DimDate table contains calendar information. Use DateKey to join with fact tables. CalendarYear represents the year, and CalendarQuarter represents the quarter (1-4).

Products are stored in DimProduct. EnglishProductName contains the product name. StandardCost is the cost to produce, while ListPrice is the retail price. ProductLine values: R=Road, M=Mountain, T=Touring, S=Standard.
Geographic information is in DimGeography. EnglishCountryRegionName contains country names. StateProvinceName contains state/province names. Use GeographyKey to join with customer data.
